scripts.release: npm run build && npm publish --access=public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish --access=public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish --access=public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish --access=public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:preminor: npm run build && npm version preminor && npm publish --access=public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:pre: npm run build && npm version prerelease && npm publish --access=public && git push --follow-tags
